responses: Hello! How can I assist you today?
Hi! What symptoms are you experiencing?
Hey! How can I help you today?
Hello! What brings you here today?
Fever can be a sign of many illnesses. How long have you had a fever?
Having a fever is common with infections. Do you have any other symptoms?
Coughing can be due to a cold, flu, or other conditions. Is it a dry or wet cough?
How long have you had this cough? Do you have a sore throat or any other symptoms?

patterns: Are you experiencing shortness of breath?
responses: Shortness of breath can be serious. Are you experiencing chest pain as well?
How severe is your shortness of breath? Do you have any other symptoms?

patterns: Do you have a sore throat?
responses: A sore throat can be a sign of a cold or strep throat. Do you have a fever or cough?
How long have you had a sore throat? Do you have any other symptoms like a cough or fever?
Headaches can be caused by many factors, including stress or migraines. How severe is your headache?
Do you have any other symptoms along with the headache, like nausea or vision changes?
Fatigue can be a symptom of many conditions, including infections or stress. How long have you been feeling this way?
Are you experiencing any other symptoms along with fatigue, like fever or body aches?

patterns: Do you have muscle or body aches?
responses: Muscle aches can be related to the flu or physical exertion. Do you have a fever or fatigue?
How long have you been experiencing muscle aches? Do you have any other symptoms?

patterns: Do you have a runny nose?
Are you experiencing a runny nose?
responses: A runny nose is common with colds and allergies. Do you have a cough or sore throat?
How long have you had a runny nose? Do you have any other symptoms like sneezing or congestion?
Nausea can be caused by various issues, including infections or food poisoning. Do you have any other symptoms like vomiting or diarrhea?
How long have you been feeling nauseous? Are you experiencing any other symptoms?
Diarrhea can be due to infections or dietary issues. Are you also experiencing nausea or stomach cramps?
How long have you had diarrhea? Do you have any other symptoms like fever or dehydration?
